topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5350134e6368726398a90100#post_5350134e6368726398a90100
I think it ultimately boils down to the fact Other M was a huge steaming shit pile of nearly painful idiocy, particularly in regards to Samus's character. When you get a slap in the face like that it can make you a bit paranoid about future ones, hence people's reaction to her high heels.

Personally I think they look kinda silly and that maybe it was a bad idea to have her wearing them given the bad taste Other M left in everyone's mouth. I get that they're supposed to be rocket shoes or whatever, but surely there is a less retarded looking design they could have used.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@HeroInferno":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/535019b46368720db3830000#post_535019b46368720db3830000
Yeah, but the co-producer on the team that makes metroid said he wanted to work on new franchises and such instead of things like metroid.  It's the same reason why starfox is six feet under as well; they do *NOT* want to work on a new game.  It's not that they don't have the ability to make a new game, rather they have no intention of doing so.

Sorry starfox fans, but your franchise is officially dead.

Yeah I know I keep talking about ukraine, but that eastern part of ukraine that is currently in the news with illegal militia and wanting to join russia sent out fliers to the people living in there that all jews must register themselves with pro-russian forces or face their citizenship in the city revoked, thrown out and their property seized.

Scumbag pro-russian milita: seizes town under pretense of "protecting people of russian descent" then orders jews to register with them.

topics.body: In all seriousness though, where can I move where there is freedom and common sense in government? That whole thing with the special ed kid and wiretapping really showed me how messed up this country is. I want to live somewhere where there is true freedom, where corporate greed does not run nearly everything, and where sex is not considered of the devil.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53507c3f6368724c13d90100#post_53507c3f6368724c13d90100
"freedom indexes" are a load of crap. They rank countries on what matters to an investment banker. Nothing about personal freedom or anything that matters, all they care about is the strength of the economy and how free you are economically. They would say a country where breathing is illegal is "free" because they have low taxes and a very competitive and strong economy.
